name: SoundcheckHero
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content. This skill can extend the  mic timeout.
Invocation Name: soundcheck hero
Developer Terms of Use
des:
See if you can become the Soundcheck Hero!

Test your music knowledge by guessing the artist and title of the most famous songs in history. Narrated by some of your favorite artists, Soundcheck Hero is the game to prove that you know music best!


SOUNDCHECK FAMILY HERO

Do you know the most music out of your friends or family? Do you think your family can beat any other family as a team? Try the Soundcheck Family Hero game now to test your skills to prove it! Compete at home with (or against) your loved ones to show who’s the real Soundcheck Family Hero!


SOUNDCHECK ELVIS HERO

“Who’s the King of Rock and Roll?”

Already know the answer? Then you’re ready to become the Soundcheck Elvis Hero! Guess the names of Elvis’ famous tracks and hidden gems to show your friends, family, and other fans around the world that you know Elvis best. Make sure to listen closely for fun facts on Elvis’ career, personal life, and inspirations for his songs.


Check back quarterly for new Soundcheck Hero artists and band games!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
